text:
Erin Andrews gets married at picturesque wedding

Fox Sports reporter Erin Andrews and former NHL player Jarret Stoll got married on Saturday at Yellowstone Club in Montana, according to People.com.

The couple had been dating since 2012 and announced their engagement back in December of 2016.

The ceremony was held on a mountainside at the resort near Yellowstone National Park with guests like Joe Buck and Michael Strahan in attendance.

The Griswolds #JE2017 A post shared by kendraandrews (@kendraandrews) on Jun 25, 2017 at 7:04am PDT

I love my business partner @smac_entertainment @conschwartz cc @koralchen @josetonydiaz @vtrilling #dontfireus #JE2017 A post shared by michaelstrahan (@michaelstrahan) on Jun 24, 2017 at 8:06pm PDT

Seeing stripes! How dreamy are these table settings!? @erinandrews So this is how you ''Mountain" chic-ly! 🌾🌸🍴#montana #JE2017 A post shared by anitapatrickson (@anitapatrickson) on Jun 25, 2017 at 1:43pm PDT

What a magical weekend in Montana 🌲☀️🌾💕 #teamEA @kayleenmcadams @anitapatrickson #JE2017 A post shared by Kylee Heath (@kyleeheathhair) on Jun 25, 2017 at 11:42am PDT

Yup. #humnow A post shared by Willie Mitchell (@willie_mitch33) on Jun 24, 2017 at 3:38pm PDT

Congratulations to them both.
title: USA TODAY

og.description: The couple has been together since 2012.
